# @dnd-kit-svelte/svelte

[![Stable release](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@dnd-kit-svelte/svelte.svg)](https://npm.im/@dnd-kit-svelte/svelte)

@dnd-kit â€“ a lightweight React library for building performant and accessible drag and drop experiences.

## Installation

To get started, install the `@dnd-kit-svelte/svelte` package via npm or yarn:

```
npm install @dnd-kit-svelte/svelte
```

## Usage

Visit [next.dndkit.com](https://next.dndkit.com/react/quickstart) to learn how to get started with @dnd-kit.
